'''Sharon L. Baird''' (born [[16 August|August 16]], [[1943]]) is an American actress. She originally shot to fame in [[1955]] as a [[wikipedia:Mouseketeer|Mouseketeer]], and remained one until adulthood. In [[1978]], she participated in [[Ralph Bakshi]]'s [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|film of ''The Lord of the Rings'']], as the rotoscoping actor of [[Frodo Baggins]].
